The scope of Independent Engineer in BOT projects does not have provision of Horticulturist and hence the work of horticulture neglected. 2. In view of above, it has been decided that provision for engagement of Horticulturist at sub-professional level with intermittent input (minimum 4 months in a year and at least one month in each quarter) may be incorporated in the scope of work of Independent Engineers in all proposals being invited. For ongoing projects, post of Horticulturist with the following Eligibility Criteria be included in the scope of IE/Supervision Consultant as a change of scope: Educational B.Sc. (Agriculture) from & recognized University with Qualifications Horticulture as a subject.
